observation: Green Artist  Home About the Artist Allyson’s Art Acrylics Ink Paintings Watercolour Paintings Other Work Blog Articles Checkout Select Page Oil Pastel Tiger Hi, and welcome to my site, I am an artist who loves to experiment with different techniques. I love to sketch and paint as well as creating illustrations for children's books. I am attracted to a wide variety of subjects and love to sketch and draw everything that catches my eye, from busy urban centres to sleepy villages. I plan to chronicle my travels around Britain (when it is possible!) with a big flask of tea, a folding windbreak and, most importantly, my favourite sketchbooks. Feeding the ducks – Bowness on Windermere Click image for larger version. I saw this little girl feeding the ducks and geese at the waters edge in Bowness and it was so appealing that I just... read more Walking in the rain Click image for larger version.
